translations: 斯泰森毡帽（一种阔边高顶毡帽）

sentences.sentence: There I saw one I knew, and stopped him, crying Stetson !
sentences.translation: 我看到了熟人，喊住他，斯坦森！

sentences.sentence: There I saw one I knew, and stopped him, crying "Stetson!"
sentences.translation: 在那里我看见一个熟人，拦住他叫道：斯代真！

sentences.sentence: Rebuilding, with the arrival of Big Oil in his stetson and size thirteens, has shaped the modern metropolis.
sentences.translation: 灾后重建，加上戴软呢帽，穿13号鞋的石油大亨的到来，使安克雷奇变成了一个现代都市。
